front.title: Registration of xmlns Media Feature Tag

abstract.t: This document specifies an xmlns Media Feature per RFC 2506 [5] for identifying some or all of the URIs defining XML namespaces [14] in a given XML resource, and the relative importance of these namespaces. This feature is designed primarily for use with the XML Media Types defined in RFC 3023 [12], to provide additional hints as to the processing requirements of a given XML resource
